title: FAKE Alert: Govt is NOT providing Rs 3,500 under ‘Pradhan Mantri Berozgaar Bhatta Yojana’ | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared on social media with a claim that under the ‘Pradhan Mantri Berozgaar Bhatta Yojana’ (Prime Minister unemployment allowance), one can avail Rs 3,500 by registering on a given link ( mentioned in the post also).

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

Verified government sources confirmed that the viral post, in circulation, is FAKE. The Press Information Bureau (PIB) in a Facebook post explicitly stated that the message in circulation is false.

In its post, PIB clarified that there is no such government scheme and the giving website link is also fake.

The above information, thus proves, that the message in circulation is false.
